headline: Sen. Mark Kelly on No-Fly Zone: ‘It Is in the Best Interest of Everybody’ to Avoid War with Russia
sentences:
‘The first thing we would have to do is suppress the enemy air defenses, so we would have to take out the Russian surface-to-air missile sites’
EXCERPT:
KELLY: “At this point, I think it is in the best interest of everybody for us to avoid being at war with Russia.
The support we’re giving Ukraine right now is effective.”
